skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Polearm Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 when using a polearm.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 4.2 and Evasion by 3 when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 3.3 when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: Boost HP
skills.Description: Increases Max HP by 60.

skills.Name: Wild Sweep
skills.Description: Attacks multiple enemies simultaneously with 280 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a polearm. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Triple Slash
skills.Description: Slash with three deadly strikes dealing 285 Physical Damage. Requires a dualsword and gain a stack of Momentum.

skills.Name: Sonic Blaster
skills.Description: Release a powerful burst of energy from your swords towards your target, dealing 380 Energy Damage. Requires a dualsword, sword or blunt weapon weapon.

skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Polearm Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 when using a polearm.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 4.2 and Evasion by 3 when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 3.3 when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: Fast HP Recovery
skills.Description: Increases HP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Sonic Mastery
skills.Description: Absorbs the target's Momentum. Momentum can be absorbed with a 15% chance for regular physical attacks and 30% during a critical attack. Applies when a sword, blunt weapon, or dualsword is equipped. Up to stage 1 of Momentum can be absorbed.

skills.Name: Wild Sweep
skills.Description: Attacks multiple enemies simultaneously with 280 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a polearm. Over-hit.

skills.Name: Triple Slash
skills.Description: Slash with three deadly strikes dealing 285 Physical Damage. Requires a dualsword and gain a stack of Momentum.

skills.Name: Sonic Blaster
skills.Description: Release a powerful burst of energy from your swords towards your target, dealing 380 Energy Damage. Requires a dualsword, sword or blunt weapon weapon.

skills.Name: Enrage
skills.Description: You won't give up, becoming enraged. Heal 10% of total HP..

skills.Name: Double Sonic Slash
skills.Description: Energizing the stored energy in your swords, you release a devastating attack dealing 500 Energy Damage. Damage increases up to 2nd stage Momentum. Requires a dualsword weapon and 2 Momentum to cast.

skills.Name: Detect Insect Weakness

skills.Name: Spinning Slasher
skills.Description: Swings a spear to attack nearby enemies with 390 Power added to P. Atk. Requires a polearm to be equipped. Ignores Shield Defense. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: War Cry
skills.Description: Increases P. Skill Damage. by  5% for 5 minute.
